text: The Chevrolet Tracker is a subcompact Crossover SUV made by General Motors under Chevrolet since 2019. == History and Features == The nameplate "Tracker" was first used in a rebadged Suzuki Escudo sold in North America from the 1990s to the 2000s later it was used for the Chevrolet Trax sold in South America and Russia the Chinese-made Tracker was shown in 2019 alongside the Trailblazer it was made to replace the Trax in China and uses the Global Emerging Markets plataform (GEM). It has a 1.0 1.2 1.3 and 1.5 liter all turbo petrol engines and a 6-speed manual automatic DCT or CVT transmissions. == Markets == The Chevrolet Tracker is currently sold in China. Brazil. Argentina (where its imported from the Joinville factory in Brazil and is the only B-segment or subcompact SUV made there). Mexico. Uzbekistan (where its also made locally there). and Philipines. == References == Tracker Category:2010s automobiles Category:2020s automobiles Category:Sport utility vehicles
title: Chevrolet Tracker (2019)
